archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.3c: c) examining activity observed on deployed honeypots or honeynets (e.g. decoy systems that present fake applications and information in order to observe malicious attackers and collect forensic information about their activity)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
